summary: A ReDoS vulnerability (CVE-2022-25883) was detected in the semver dependency (version 7.5.0) transitive through ts-loader. The issue was automatically closed after the vulnerable library was removed from the inventory.
userImpact: Users could be affected by a Regular Expression Denial of Service attack if untrusted user data is provided to semver's Range function.
rootCause: semver library versions before 7.5.2 contain a ReDoS vulnerability in the Range function when processing untrusted input.
proposedFix: Upgrade semver to version 7.5.2 or later (also available: 5.7.2, 6.3.1).
resolutionDetails: Issue was automatically closed by Mend because the vulnerable library was either ignored or removed from the inventory.
keyQuote: Versions of the package semver before 7.5.2 are vulnerable to Regular Expression Denial of Service (ReDoS) via the function new Range
